name: Space Hopper (itch)
description:
Hop into your spaceship and clear out the enemies from the giant asteroid!

Main features:

  • Procedural asteroid generation
  • Quick bossfights with increasing difficulty
  • A single health per run
  • Atari like graphics and sound effects

If you have any questions about the controls or the gameplay, read the Readme
included in the zip.

Share your opinion about the game! How far did you get?
